responseText: NSLOCTEXT("", "D3E66906471310FE846E5CABF5750847", "Yes. I see. If this is true, this Uulorian mage hopes to perform an arcane ritual upon an invisible fount of essence,  a weakened point in existence where the magic can flow if one can tap into it. The Star of Blinding Light is that tap, and the blinding light is our fate if we cannot stop him. ")
name: MADD_0005A_BDA_EudoxiaAvenmoor_Phase02_37
